label.en: 25/26 S regular part 2 3 CP LT Eng
label.et: 25/26 K PÕ 2. osa 3 EAP LT Eng

description.en:
In this course, the student will gain knowledge about the advancement in the research related to theoretical informatics and experience by applying the knowledge to a concrete real-life problem. In addition, they will have the choice to work in an environment where they can grasp knowledge from other members of the team. 
The topics are related to theoretical informatics and they are agreed upon with a supervisor.
description.et:
Kursusel omandatakse teadmisi teoreetilise informaatika kohta; omandatakse kogemusi rakendades neid konkreetsele probleemile. Lisaks on võimalik töötada keskkonnas, kus saadakse teadmisi teistelt meeskonnaliikmetelt.
Teemad on seotud teoreetilise informaatikaga kokkuleppel juhendajaga.

objectives.en: The objective of the course is to give students knowledge and skills for performing an application project in the field of theoretical informatics and related areas.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on anda õpilastele teadmisi ja oskusi teoreetilisest informaatikast ja sellega seotud valdkondade uurimistöö tegemiseks.

objectives.en: The students shall get an understanding on how to conduct applied project in addressing specific issues related to theoretical informatics within one of the teams (Cryptography, Algorithms and Theory, Coding and Information Transmission team).
objectives.et: Üliõpilased õpivad viima läbi rakendusprojekti teoreetilise informaatikaga seotud spetsiifiliste küsimuste lahendamiseks ühes Andmeturbe ja teoreetilise arvutiteaduse õppetooli juures tegutsevas meeskonnas (algoritmide ja teooria, kodeerimisteooria, infoedastuse meeskond.)

learning_outcomes.en: On successful completion of this course, the students will have learned:
learning_outcomes.et: Kursuse edukaks lõpetamisel on üliõpilane omandanud:

learning_outcomes.en: -  How to use theoretical approach in applied research.
- To work and interact with the supervisor and other researchers and members of the team.
learning_outcomes.et: - Kuidas töötada ja suhelda juhendaja ja teiste meeskonnaliikmetega.

learning_outcomes.en: -  To work independently under the guidance of a supervisor to fulfill an open project.
learning_outcomes.et: - Töötada iseseisvalt juhendaja abil etteantud projekti elluviimiseks.

independent_work.et: The student is expected to work independently on the topic agreed upon with the supervisor. The supervisor will provide sufficient consultation and collaboration opportunities to allow the student to successfully finish the project.

description.et: The final grade is established based on the performance in the assigned project, written report, class presentation and participation in the meetings.
The final grade is established based on the performance in the assigned project, written report, class presentation and participation in the meetings.

grade_evaluation.et: The final grade is established based on the performance in the assigned project, written report, class presentation and participation in the meetings.

name.en: Chair of Security and Theoretical Computer Science
Chair of Security and Theoretical Computer Science

audience.et: The course is targeted towards master’s students in computer science. The prerequisites depend on the topic chosen and have to be discussed with the supervisor
